com.bolzano.Task02

Class sag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bolzano.Task02.sag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinearSolver

    public class sag
extends Object
implements LinearSolver
    Stochastic average gradient (SAG) method for optimizing the sum of a finite number of smooth convex functions. Like stochastic gradient (SG) methods, the SAG methodâ€™s iteration cost is independent of the number of terms in the sum.
    Author:
    Mark Schmidt, Nicolas Le Roux, and Francis Bach Minimizing Finite Sums with the Stochastic Average Gradient https://hal.inria.fr/hal-00860051/document, Vinay Bharadhwa - 3190098

        public void setParams(dataframe X,
                      dataframe y,
                      dataframe theta,
                      int max_epochs,
                      double lambda,
                      double learning_rate,
                      double threshold)
        Setter method for setting the following parameters.
        Specified by:
        setParams in interface LinearSolver
        Parameters:
        X - The data variable.
        y - The labels for the data.
        theta - The weights for the data.
        max_epochs - The maximum number of iterations for logistic regression.
        lambda - The regularization ratio.
        learning_rate - The learning rate for gradient descent or the "C" value for SAG solver.
        threshold - The threshold for prediction for gradient descent.
